chatGptLabel: Create a reponse to a freelance project posting
promptPrefix:
There is this website that posts freelance project opportunities.
I am currently applying for projects on this website.
One project that I taken interest into is:
[PROMPT]

Can you write a suitable first message, in [TARGETLANGUAGE], that will: make me stand out, show my interest and show my relevant expertise for this project.
Before you write the message, you can ask me questions to ensure you have all the required details.
title: Create a reponse to a freelance project posting
